---
title: "Read spatial data and create a map with R and ggplot2"
abstract: "Learn to read vector spatial data with R and the sf package and create a map to visualize spatial data with the ggplot2 package."
---

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(sf)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Linking to GEOS 3.10.2, GDAL 3.4.2, PROJ 8.2.1; sf_use_s2() is TRUE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)
```
:::
